mapper.insert: insert into ljy_label_dic (id, name, value, description, parentId, pic, creationDate, createdBy, modifyDate, modifiedBy) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{value,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{pic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creationdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createdby,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{modifydate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifiedby,jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.update: update ljy_label_dic set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, value = #{value,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parentId = #{parentid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, pic = #{pic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creationDate = #{creationdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, createdBy = #{createdby,jdbcType=BIGINT}, modifyDate = #{modifydate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modifiedBy = #{modifiedby,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, name, value, description, parentId, pic, creationDate, createdBy, modifyDate, modifiedBy from ljy_label_dic where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id, name, value, description, parentId, pic, creationDate, createdBy, modifyDate, modifiedBy from ljy_label_dic
